titleStmt.title: Private Letter: Date?: to Mrs Prebble

sourceDesc.p: MTG HB m2001/34/1, 17022. No date, but the handwriting is that of his old age. The Hawke’s Bay Herald of 23 December 1898 advertised “CHOICEST Peaches, Grapes, Plums, Apricots, Strawberries, Cherries, Pines, Bananas, Apples, Currants. Prebble’s.”

front.p: Date?: to Mrs PrebbleMTG HB m2001/34/1, 17022. No date, but the handwriting is that of his old age. The Hawke’s Bay Herald of 23 December 1898 advertised “CHOICEST Peaches, Grapes, Plums, Apricots, Strawberries, Cherries, Pines, Bananas, Apples, Currants. Prebble’s.”

body.p: Being very busy to day I was not able to get down to town, and I forgot to speak to my man in time.—–
If you have any good fresh strawberries left, I will thank you to give him a box for me. Those, a few days ago, were much praised by the Ladies on the hill.—
